settings.title: MORE INFO
CARE INSTRUCTIONS
settings.custom_liquid:
{%- if product.type == 'Jewelry' -%}

Jewelry Care Instructions

  • Keep jewelry away from water, moisture, and humidity. Avoid wearing it while swimming, bathing, or engaging in any water-related activities.
  • Store jewelry in a cool, dry place, preferably in a jewelry box or airtight container. This will prevent exposure to air, moisture, and dust, which can cause tarnishing and damage.
  • Avoid contact with perfumes, lotions, hairsprays, and other chemicals. These substances can react with the metal or stones in the jewelry and cause discoloration or deterioration.
  • Clean jewelry regularly using a soft cloth or a mild jewelry cleaner specifically designed for jewelry. Gently wipe the surface to remove any dirt, oils, or residue.
  • Handle the jewelry with care and avoid excessive pulling or tugging, as it can lead to the breakage of chains, clasps, or components.
  • When not in use, store different pieces of jewelry separately to prevent scratching or tangling.
  • If any stones become loose or fall out, get them repaired or replaced promptly to maintain the overall appearance and integrity of the jewelry.
  • Periodically inspect your jewelry for any signs of damage or wear. If you notice any issues, take it to a professional jeweler for repair.
{%-endif-%} {%- if product.type == 'Saree' or product.type == 'Blouse'-%}

Saree / Blouse Care Instructions

  • Void washing silk sarees or blouses by hand or in a washing machine.
  • If the saree/blouse becomes stained, promptly blot the stain with cold water.
  • Never dry silk/silk cotton sarees or blouses directly under sunlight as it can cause the color to fade.
  • Avoid bundling up the saree/blouse to prevent the zari/embroidery threads from tangling.
  • Store the saree/blouse in a breathable cotton muslin cloth, allowing air circulation and preventing sticking when stacked.
  • Do not store the saree/blouse in a plastic cover to avoid blackening of the gold zari.
{%-endif-%} {%- if product.type == 'Bag'-%}

Hand Bags Care Instructions

  • Handle the handbag with clean hands to avoid transferring dirt, oils, or other substances onto the fabric or surface.
  • Protect the handbag from excessive moisture or water. Avoid using it in rainy conditions or placing it directly on wet surfaces.
  • If the handbag gets stained, gently blot the stain with a clean cloth or sponge using mild soap and water. Avoid rubbing the stain vigorously, as it can damage the fabric or finish.
  • Avoid exposing the handbag to direct sunlight for prolonged periods, as it can cause fading or discoloration. When not in use, store the handbag in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
  • Be cautious when handling sharp objects or rough surfaces to prevent scratches or tears on the handbag material.
  • Avoid overstuffing the handbag, as it can distort the shape and strain the seams or handles. Instead, maintain a reasonable load to preserve the handbag's structural integrity.
  • Regularly clean the handbag's interior by emptying it and removing any debris or dust. Use a soft brush or a lint roller to gently clean the lining.
  • Store the handbag in a dust bag or a breathable cloth cover to protect it from dust, dirt, and potential scratches when not in use.
{%-endif-%}

settings.title: SHIPPING & RETURN
settings.content:
DELIVERY

Dispatch: Within 3-4 days without Blouse Stitching. With "Stitched Designer Blouse" option, it will take another 10 - 12 business days. Free shipping across all products on a minimum purchase of $75 USD. International delivery time 5-7 business days.

RETURNS

IndyVogue prides itself in making sure that the product shipped to its patrons are of the highest quality & standard. We would do everything to make sure we help you in choosing the right product. If a customer wishes to return it, they will have to bear the cost of shipping the product back to IndyVogue locations in USA / India along with 5% restock fee.In the rare occasion, if you need to return an item, please send us an email to sumanab@indyvogue.com within 48 hours of the shipment being delivered with picture of any issue that you see in the item for return authorization. The patron will need to ship the item in its original packaging and will have to pay for the return shipping charge to our Fulfillment Center in Austin, TX OR Kolkata, India, whichever is convenient to the patron. But we are sure that situation will never arise.The items need to be returned within 7 days of the shipment being received else return requests will be cancelled. Please look at our Delivery & Returns section for further information.

settings.title: COLOR DISCLAIMER
settings.content: We take utmost care when taking pictures of our products. But sometimes shades displayed across the different kind of fabrics and accessories may slightly vary from the actual color. This most likely could happen due to different settings in your monitor or viewing device like Laptop, Mobile OR Tablet. Also photos seen in different brands of same device like in an IPhone vs Samsung Galaxy might look different. We request you to consider these minor color variations.Video have been added to provide you a glimpse of the texture and work of the Saree. The color shown in the picture is a more accurate representation of the product.

settings.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
settings.custom_liquid:
{%- if product.type == 'Saree'-%}
  • I want to get a saree and stitch the blouse as well. How can I send you the measurements?

    A: Once you place the order with the Stitched Designer Blouse option, you will receive an order confirmation email that will contain the link to the Blouse Measurement Form . You can fill in the measurement there.

  • Can I send my own Blouse design?

    A:  We have a variety of designs for front and back necks. But in case you want your own design, just let us know after you have placed the order and we will take care of that.

  • I have some blouse pieces with me. Can I just stitch the blouse with you?

    A: Unfortunately you only stitch the blouse with IndyVogue if you have ordered the Saree from us as well. 

  • Where do you ship your items from?

    A: Most of our items get shipped from Kolkata, India through DHL priority shipment.

  • How long will it take for me to receive the Saree that I just ordered?

    A: If you have placed an order for Saree, we will ship it within 1 - 2 business days and it should take you another 4 - 5 business days to reach you. If you ordered the Saree with the  Stitched Designer Blouse  option, it will take another 4 - 5 business days to stitch the Blouse after you have submitted the Blouse Measurement Form.

  • I do not want to make online payment. Is there a different way of paying?

    A: You can Venmo, Zelle, Wise or even send a paper check to make the payment. Please call us at +1 913-579-2118 OR email us at sumanab@indyvogue.com OR chat with us online.

  • How do I know the status of my order?

    A: At every step in you ordering process, we will keep you informed. When you place an order, you will receive an "Order Confirmation Email", when an order is Shipped, you will receive a " Shipment Confirmation Email", when an order is Out for Delivery you will receive a text message and finally when the Order is Delivered, you will receive a "Delivery Confirmation Email" and a text message.

{%-endif-%}
